tool_description:
DomainTools is a one-stop tool to check domain availability, MX, A records and whois data.
If you need any other features, just hit me with them in the discussion box!
Happy 200!
name: DomainTools
title: DomainTools

api_list.name: MX, A, NS Records
api_list.description: Get A, MX, NS, SOA, TXT, and CNAME records for any domain.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://domaintools2.p.rapidapi.com/checkrecord"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domaintools2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Whois Data
api_list.description: Gets the whois data for a domain
